attributes.title: Divide
attributes.caption: More than ever before, the allied forces standing against Salem need to be united. But after Ironwood refused to continue evacuating Mantle, our heroes need to choose a new path forward -- if only they could agree on one.
attributes.description: More than ever before, the allied forces standing against Salem need to be united. But after Ironwood refused to continue evacuating Mantle, our heroes need to choose a new path forward -- if only they could agree on one.

attributes.title: Refuge
attributes.caption: Ruby, Nora, Blake, May, and Penny set their sights on Atlas Military Command. Meanwhile Yang, Ren, Jaune, and Oscar handle evacuations in Mantle. If they can get everyone to the crater in time, they just might be able to save them.
attributes.description: Ruby, Nora, Blake, May, and Penny set their sights on Atlas Military Command. Meanwhile Yang, Ren, Jaune, and Oscar handle evacuations in Mantle. If they can get everyone to the crater in time, they just might be able to save them.

attributes.title: Strings
attributes.caption: The fate of humanity requires our heroes to infiltrate the most heavily-guarded facility in Atlas -- all in a day's work.
attributes.description: The fate of humanity requires our heroes to infiltrate the most heavily-guarded facility in Atlas -- all in a day's work.

attributes.title: Fault
attributes.caption: Jaune, Ren, and Yang's pursuit of a mysterious new Grimm results in unexpected complications. Ruby, Weiss, and Blake find a new place to lay low. Cinder receives an ultimatum.
attributes.description: Jaune, Ren, and Yang's pursuit of a mysterious new Grimm results in unexpected complications. Ruby, Weiss, and Blake find a new place to lay low. Cinder receives an ultimatum.

attributes.title: Amity
attributes.caption: This is it. Their chance to tell the world the truth. Will their message be heard?
attributes.description: This is it. Their chance to tell the world the truth. Will their message be heard?

attributes.title: War
attributes.caption: It's all out war in Atlas. Our heroes face an impossible problem. Where do they go from here?
attributes.description: It's all out war in Atlas. Our heroes face an impossible problem. Where do they go from here?

attributes.title: Witch
attributes.caption: The clock is ticking on Jaune, Ren, and Yang's rescue mission. The Ace-Ops hold the line against against Salem's forces.
attributes.description: The clock is ticking on Jaune, Ren, and Yang's rescue mission. The Ace-Ops hold the line against against Salem's forces.

attributes.title: Ultimatum
attributes.caption: As the fog of war covers the kingdom, Atlas nears its breaking point.
attributes.description: As the fog of war covers the kingdom, Atlas nears its breaking point.

attributes.title: Risk
attributes.caption: Tensions rise in Schnee Manor as our reunited heroes find themselves backed into corner.
attributes.description: Tensions rise in Schnee Manor as our reunited heroes find themselves backed into corner.

attributes.title: Creation
attributes.caption: It's risky, dangerous, and nearly impossible -- but it's the best plan they've got.
attributes.description: It's risky, dangerous, and nearly impossible -- but it's the best plan they've got.

attributes.title: The Final Word
attributes.caption: Sometimes it's worth it all to risk the fall.
attributes.description:
Sometimes it's worth it all to risk the fall. 

If you're thinking about suicide, or are worried about a friend or loved one, National Suicide Prevention Hotline is a resource to help: 1-800-273-TALK (8255).
